sen.j: 河原崎 権十郎（かわらさき ごんじゅうろう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Its yago (stage family name) is Yamazakiya (kabuki).
The stage family name is Yamazakiya.
sen.cmt: 原文には「（歌舞伎）」とありますが、リンク先の単語が抽出されるバグのようですので、削除しました。
sen.e: The stage family name is Yamazakiya.
Current Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is the fourth.
Current Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is the fourth.
Current Gonjuro KAWARASAKI is the fourth.

sen.j: 定紋は八ツ花菱に二ツ巴、替紋は菱宝結び。
sen.e: Its jomon (family crest) is Yatsubanabishi ni Futatsudomoe, Ryohomusubi.

The Jomon (family crest) is Yatsu-bana bishi ni Futatsu-domoe (eight square-shaped flowers and two tomoe [semicircular swirling shape]) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Hishi Takara Musubi (literally, square knot).
sen.cmt: ウェブに合わせて「替紋は」を原文・訳文に補足しました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Yatsu-bana bishi ni Futatsu-domoe (eight square-shaped flowers and two tomoe [semicircular swirling shape]) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Hishi Takara Musubi (literally, square knot).

tit.j: 初代 河原崎権十郎
tit.cmt: 原文には 「市川團十郎 (9代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「初代 河原崎権十郎」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。

sen.j: のちの市川團十郎 (9代目)。
sen.e: He later succeeded to Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the ninth).
He later succeeded to Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the ninth).
He later succeeded to Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the ninth).

sen.j: 俗に「浅草の市村羽左衛門 (15代目)」。
sen.e: He was commonly called "Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 15th) of Asakusa".
He was commonly called 'Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 15th) of Asakusa.'
He was commonly called 'Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 15th) of Asakusa.'
He was a son of the second.
He was a son of the second.
He was a son of the second.

sen.j: 市村羽左衛門 (17代目)の三男。
sen.e: He is the third son of Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 17th).
He is the third son of Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 17th).
He is the third son of Uzaemon ICHIKAWA (the 17th).
His former name was Shonosuke BANDO.
He calls himself Shonosuke BANDO.
He calls himself Shonosuke BANDO.
